title: "Vietnamese financial services app MFast gets $1.5M pre-Series A led by Do Ventures"
excerpt: "MFast, a mobile app that lets Vietnamese users in remote areas access financial services, announced today it has raised a $1.5 million pre-Series A. The round was led by Do Ventures, with participation from JAFCO Asia."
